summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lot 17, Block 7, Denny & Hoyts Addition, and the unplatted property lying between the easterly line of Empire Way and a line 150 feet easterly and parallel thereto from the north line of Section 3, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W. M. (South line of Roxbury Street produced West) to the existing Manufacturing District as now established near the production easterly of Sunnyview Drive, with respect to Use District, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto a new section numbered 2-40.
